summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OTNT ERP Week 2 Inventory Core system. All backend APIs (44/44) and frontend features working correctly. Successfully tested login, dashboard stats, warehouses management, inventory documents creation/posting, and stock balance tracking.
passed_tests: Dashboard shows 3 warehouses and stock value
Warehouses page lists 3 seeded warehouses (Kho Hà Nội, Kho TP.HCM, Kho Đà Nẵng)
Inventory page shows Phiếu kho and Tồn kho tabs
Create Receipt (Phiếu nhập) dialog opens and validates
Create Transfer (Phiếu chuyển) with destination warehouse selection
Stock balance tracking with 2 existing entries
